GUI

Class Packman

  • java.lang.Object
    • GUI.Packman

  • public class Packman
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents a packman in the game with id, movement speed, radius of eating, score(the sum of weights of all fruits it ate), path(collection of fruits that it needs to eat) time(the time it took for it to finish it's path).
    Author:
    Alex Nour Ilya
